channel.title: impact on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in impact on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: My impactful change stories
item.description: Recently, I have been invited to share my 3 years Thoughtworks Journey, at “Impact Series” by Social Change Group TW, India. “Striving for positive social change is at the heart of our purpose, culture and work” — /thoughtworks I believe an impactful change is the change that changes you, and any social change start from within, our own journey. I shared my change journey, and received number of comments, and feedbacks.
